column4: hi guys.. im having some troubles with network-manager in 9.10. The problem is that i create vpn connections but when i try to connect there`s no log in var/log/messages so i dont know whats happening.. any ideas?
I cant even create vpn connections
maybe you dont have the pkgs.. network-manager-openvpn or network-manager-pptp
where its suposse to log the vpn events? I tail -f /var/logs/messages, then connect (form network-manager) but nothing happen
I can see some entries in /var/log/syslog
